Html:
For example, changing the following in the DragNDropSample's MainWindow.xaml:
<!--<Setter Property="CanDrag" Value="{Controls:MethodBinding CanDrag}" />--> <Setter Property="CanDrag" Value="true" />

You'll get a null reference exception.
Ah, it's not a boolean dependency property. Well, that makes sense now. Never mind.
